result.eng: She wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ga: níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.orig: níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.html: níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ponchtml: níor ḃean í a ċuaiġ siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].

result.eng: If that's what fate had in store for her, she'd do it.
result.ga: má bhí sé sin sa chinniúint di dhéanfadh sí é
result.orig: má bhí sé sin sa chinniúint di dhéanfadh sí é
result.html: má bhí sé sin sa chinniúint di dhéanfadh sí éIf that's what fate had in store for her, she'd do it.
result.ponchtml: má ḃí sé sin sa ċinniúint di ḋéanfaḋ sí éIf that's what fate had in store for her, she'd do it.

result.eng: She'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ga: b'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.orig: b'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.html: b'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ponchtml: b'ḟada i dteaċ na mboċt nó ag cruinniú na déirce í aċ go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
